content.question: In line 3, amplexus placide tumulum lapsusque per aras is translated

choices.label: calmly embracing the tomb and slipping through the altars
the tomb was calmly embraced and it slipped through the altars
with the tomb having been calmly embraced it slid through the altars
having calmly embraced the tomb and having slipped through the altars

content.answer: having calmly embraced the tomb and having slipped through the altars

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry
